item.title: Shoes widget with block
item.dc:creator: Victor Goff
item.content:encoded:
I attempted to write a tiny sample code for learning about Shoes widget with block.
# widget_with_block.rbclass Creature < Widget def initialize   msg = para '', :stroke => white   c = image Dir.pwd + '/yar.png'   yield c, msg endendShoes.app :width => 140, :height => 70 do flow :left => 10, :top => 10 do   background blue.to_s..green.to_s, :width => 100,                                     :height => 30   creature  do |c, msg|     c.click do       msg.text = 'Uhhhh...'       a = animate(20){|i| c.rotate(-15);                           a.remove if i > 22}     end     c.hover{msg.text = 'hello'}     c.leave{msg.text = ''}   end endend

Is this useful... or not? :-P

ashbb
